about_the_game:
IMPORTANT: This game's made by ONE-DEVELOPER. Chapter 1 is an initiative chapter, so story actually will starts and more happenings will come from Chapter 2. After I see the many negative reviews and people doesn't read the description, I've decided I will release Chapter 2 and next Chapters only on my Patreon site, because I can create/work, if I don't read these negative comments. Overview:
Lands Of Peace: Legends is a 3D anime, hentai, adventure, adult game with sexual contents. Myths, Legends, Monsters about a place ? Does it really exist? Is it really peaceful? After much research, you have arrived to the secret Lands of Peace...adventures await you!

About my game concept:
As I wrote, the chapter one is initiative chapter. When I dreamed this game, I wanted to create that kind of situation, what would be if you would be in this place (Lands Of Peace) in real, you arrive, you don't get everything instantly, and I wanted to simulate a real trip effect. There will be more happenings in the next chapters, but you have to understand, the game has to builds step by step. It's not an action game, or survival game. If you want play that kind of games, you can find many of course.

Lands of Peace's messages:
Slow down after your job/school, relax, play some, experience a sci-fi world with characters and enjoy the art.

Features:
- Adventure based gameplay, discover and experience!
- Fully 3D world and characters
- Excitements and curiosities

Adult Content:
- Nudity
- Sexual Scenes
- 3D animations
- Sexual interactions

Comment:
It's a ONE-DEVELOPER sci-fi adult game, so if you play, please keep it in your mind. You can message me on Steam Community or on my Discord Channel, if you have any suggestions/wishes or bugs. The Lands of Peace is in Early Access, because Chapter 1 is released and the game will be updated automatically with new chapters in the future. It's a free game. I dreamed this game and started works about 1 year ago.
